title: Spider-man Shattered Dimensions [Multi5] [PC]
description:
Year of release : 2010
Genre : Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Beenox Studios
Publisher : Activision
Preparatory data : RG Mechanics
Publication Type : RePack
Language : ENG|GER|FR|SPAIN|IT
Sound language :ENG
Tablet : not required

System requirements:
Operating System : Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo processor with a clock speed of 2.6 GHz / AMD 64 X2 3800 + or better
Memory : 1 GB (XP) / 2GB (Vista / 7)
Video Card : NVIDIA GeForce 7800 / ATI Radeon X1800 with 256 MB VRAM with hardware accelerated 3D-graphics, DirectX 9.0c compatible and supports Shader 3.0
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 13.5 GB

Description :
Fans of the legendary series of games superhero adventures await a new generation - Adventures in the four worlds, united by the plot and main character. history authored by renowned comic book artist Dan Slotte (Dan Slott) will send players to search for fragments of a mysterious artifact - the Tablet of order and chaos (Tablet of Order and Chaos), - which are scattered over a number of parallel universes. Gathering of the Tablet, the players will visit various places - in the jungle, boundless deserts and huge cities (some locations did not appear in any of the previous games.) in each of the four worlds to play the role of one of the incarnations of the legendary superhero, and use unique skills and abilities of each to deal with all enemies, collect artifacts and restore order to the universe.
